Definition at line 5 of file tabs.js.

{
      SetCookie( TabId + '_active' , NewActiveTab , 30 );

      document.getElementById( document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value ).style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById( 'td_' + document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value ).style.background = '#FFFFFF';
      
      document.getElementById( NewActiveTab ).style.display = '';
      document.getElementById( 'td_' + NewActiveTab ).style.background = '#DDDDDD';
      
      document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value = NewActiveTab;
}
